title: Game client wont show up after hitting the launch button.
body:
Hi,

I downloaded and installed the game few days ago but when I click on the "launch" button, the launcher just disappear and the login screen never show up. I checked my task manager and found the lolclient.exe did ran in the processes tab, but it just never come up. I followed the guides on the game support, re-patched the game, reinstalled the game, ran the launcher as Administrator, tried everything I can found on the board, and nothing works for me. Another issue that makes me even more confused is that for a few times the client actually did worked (5 times during these days)  and the login screen showed up, but not again for the next 10~20 attempts with same settings. I used to play league until May with the same laptop I am using right now and it worked perfectly, so I have no idea about whats going on now.

replies.body:
Most of the time when this happens, it's caused by an unstable connection to the servers. Incompatible network settings are the most common cause for this, so I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are good.

Let me know if those changes resolved this issue for you.
No the connection guide didnt work for me. I also followed the patching guide and the permission guide but neither of them work too.

In that case, we'll need to dive into some system logs in order to pinpoint the cause. I'd like you to reach out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), making sure to attach a set of [Hextech logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to expedite your ticket service.

If you have any issues with this, let me know.
